/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. The buildings, mostly white and gray, exhibit a modern architectural style, while the trees add a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray, green, and brown, reflecting the blend of urban and natural elements. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, showcasing the bustling city life of Beijing.
